title: ✋⭐️Don’t wait for this stunning & amazing opportunity to pass☀️
description: Be prepared to feel like you have walked into a NEW home! This stunning renovation was done with meticulous attention to detail. Enter through the front door into an open concept floor plan, as a recent addition was added to the back of the home to make room for a spacious NEW kitchen! The foyer entry features porcelain tile, a coat closet, and provides two entrances to the main level living space, all with NEW hardwood flooring, baseboard and trim- no expense was spared! The kitchen is the true WOW of the home, boasting "shaker" style white cabinets with crown molding and custom designed shelving and wine rack, quartz countertops, new appliances, beautiful ceramic tile backsplash behind the range, with range hood, and a spacious two tiered island with seating (in a tasteful blue accent color) and a large stainless steel undermount sink, as well as a nearby pantry closet- between the abundance of cabinets and pantry, you will never have a shortage of storage for all of your kitchen items. Two skylights compliment this space, as well! There is a back door off of the kitchen that leads to a new patio and rear level yard. Back inside, there are two rooms, open to each side of the kitchen, that you can purpose as you wish! The option for a breakfast room/formal dining, living room, are all there for you, as well as an additional coat closet near the side entry to the home from an attached garage that was recently added. This isn't just any garage! It is clean as a whistle, with white walls, and painted floor! The convenient entrance into the kitchen area provides an informal entrance, and the convenience of getting right out of your car and into your home without going outside in the rain or snow! The driveway is extra wide for ample room for parking. This level also has 3 bedrooms, all with newly refinished hardwood flooring, the hallway has been widened, and a closet added; the storage in this home is endless! A completely new bathroom on this level features wide plank porcelain flooring, new vanity, recessed lighting, and vent and heat fan.....all of the bells and whistles! New windows and new 6 panel solid wood doors also elevate the look of the entire home. Downstairs, the entire basement level is finished, doubling the size of the home! A full bathroom with updated vanity and ceramic tile floor, and a nearby cedar closet make it possible for one side to become a 4th bedroom (egress through Bilco doors). This is yet another space to purpose for your own needs- home office/gym/guest bedroom/playroom- you name it, the space is there! There is also a laundry room, utility area and additional storage closet on this level. New flooring, lighting, drywall, fresh paint, fixtures...the list goes on! Be the first to enjoy all of the new features this home has to offer, all in a tucked away, but convenient to everything type of location, not to mention top rated Marple Newtown School District! Ring doorbell and touchpad access.

title: Furnished 2BR/1.5 BA Townhome on Beautiful Block
description:
This 2BR/1.5BA townhome features an updated kitchen, front garden/sitting area, back deck, and mostly finished basement (rafters are exposed). Both bedrooms are large, with room for a king bed + furniture  and have two closets.
Bedroom 1 has a king bed and two medium-sized dressers, and bedroom 2 has a full bed, large dresser, as well as a desk and chair. All other rooms including the basement are furnished, and a reasonable number of items can be removed within reason after discussion with the owner.
East Falls is a very neighborhoody area of the city, and I really can't stress enough how quaint the block is. The house is near several SEPTA bus lines and is a short walk to East Falls Station on the Norristown/Manayunk commuter rail, which can take you to Center City in 15 minutes. It's also on the top of the hill away from the flood-prone areas, but you can walk to the Schuylkill River and Wissahickon trails in 10-15 minutes.
Move-in date would ideally be in February, but can be discussed.

title: 2BR in Quiet, Gated Community--Pets OK!
description:
2BR apartment available in Friends Housing Cooperative (https://www.fhcphilly.com), a quiet, gated community at 8th and Fairmount in Northern Liberties/ East Poplar. title: Center City Philadelphia Apts Near Rittenhouse Sq Be a Part of History
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.ÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & BoxingÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media RoomÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **

title: Welcome Home to 1712 Green Street, Located on a Quiet 3-Lined Street!!
description:
Great unit located on a quiet tree-lined street in the highly desired Fairmount - Art Museum Area. This two-bedroom bi-level residence offers stunning high ceilings with distinctive art deco details. Large windows provide an abundance of natural light. The space is enhanced by the hardwood flooring and recessed lighting. Enter into the large living room perfect for entertaining and flow right into the kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. The spacious master suite with two closets and full bath are located on this level. Out the back of the home is a stunning outdoor space dedicated to this unit only. A private fenced in back yard awaits for all your outdoor entertaining needs. Moving to the lower level of the unit is a large bedroom with ample closet space, a laundry room, full bath and extra living space for gym, office or media room. Additional storage unit is included in the basement. This home is located just steps to the Art Museum, Schuylkill River Trail, Boathouse Row, and Center City. One block away from the new Green Street Dog Park, the Spring Gardens community gardens, and the premier Roberto Clemente Park & Playground. Enjoy numerous nearby cafes and restaurants. Easy access to the brand new Whole Foods, Target, FedEx Office, and the Retro Fitness gym. Transportation is easy - considered a Walker's Paradise (Walk Score 92), a Biker's Paradise (Bike Score 95), and excellent access to bus routes and the Broad Street Subway Line.This is a definite must-see!
1712 Green St #1

title: Bright, Cozy, and Very Private 2 Bedroom Apartment in Northern Liberti
description:
Bright, cozy, and very private 2 bedroom apartment in Northern Liberties. This renovated bi-level owner's unit on the quaint N Lawrence Street takes up two floors of a three-story brick end-of-row home. Enter through your own private entrance and immediately ascend up the steps onto the 2nd floor. The Main Level consists of the Living Room with a fireplace, the Kitchen, and the bright Dining Room with five windows. A totally renovated Kitchen features all new cabinets, quartz countertops and new stainless steel appliances, including a 6-burner range , a dishwasher, and a French-door bottom-freezer refrigerator. Also on the second floor is the utility room with new washer and dryer. The 3rd floor is reached via a spiral stair and features two generous bedrooms - one with cathedral ceilings - and a fully renovated full bath. A/C, Nest thermostat, Ring security system. Located on a quiet street, this rental is within walking distance to all Northern Liberties has to offer. Tenant responsible for all utilities. First, last month rent, and SD required. No smoking, no pets please. 12 months lease only, no exceptions. Available 2/1/2023.

description:
The apartment has been completely renovated. The updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, beautiful counter tops and backsplash makes this kitchen a great place to cook. The apartment has all new flooring and paint and a refreshed bathroom, making this apartment, move-in ready. There is a spacious bonus/family room in the lower level and includes a powder room, storage area and washer/dryer hook-ups.
This first floor duplex apartment is located on a residential street close to the regional rail line and Prospect Park train stop. The Prospect Park public library and Borough office is located down the street on Maryland Avenue. The apartment is in close proximity to shopping and restaurants along the MacDade Blvd. and Route 420 corridor. Jump on 95 and 476 for easy access to the greater Philadelphia area. The Philadelphia Airport is just a few minutes away. Lots of great downtown areas in Prospect Park, Ridley Park and Media too.

title: Incredible 2-bed apartment*modern finishes with great city view
description:
112 N 2ND STREET, PHILADELPHIA, PA 19106
This is an incredible 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom condo featuring a fantastic combination of industrial and modern finishes throughout and GARAGE PARKING included. Located in a secure building with great amenities including garage parking, you'll love the spacious and bright layout of this unit offering hardwood floors, high ceilings, exposed spiral ductwork, and in-unit laundry. You enter into a long hallway that leads straight back to your modern kitchen and then living area. The open floor plan provides great space for a variety of furniture arrangements and a balcony is perfect for enjoying the warmer months! Your galley kitchen boasts bar seating, cabinetry above & below, granite countertops, and sleek stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, electric stove / oven, built-in microwave, and refrigerator. There's a bedroom area off of the living area to the right and your primary bedroom is to the left. The primary room is gorgeous with large windows, plenty of room for a king-sized bed, and a stunning walk-through closet that leads to your attached bathroom. Bathroom features include tile flooring, dual sink vanity with tons of storage, 2 medicine cabinets, and a tiled shower with sleek sliding glass doors. Down the hallway towards the front of the unit is a closet with your in-unit washer and dryer plus storage space, another bedroom, and a hall bath boasting fantastic mosaic tiling, a modern vanity, and a tiled bathtub / shower combo. Building amenities include secure entry, fitness center, shared courtyard, 1 off-street garage parking spot, and more! Call today to claim this gem as your own! About The Neighborhood: This gorgeous condo is nestled in the desirable Old City neighborhood and walkable to countless iconic Philly hotspots! Conveniently located right off of I-95, I-676, and the Benjamin Franklin Bridge for an easy commute. Walking distance to Franklin Square, Independence Hall, Washington Square, Race & Cherry Street Piers, and Penn's Landing. Nearby public transportation options including buses and the Market Frankford Subway Line. Check out neighborhood favorites like Cafe Ole, Paddy's Old City Pub, Tomo Sushi & Ramen, Old City Coffee Inc, Race Street Cafe, ICI Macarons, Franklin Fountain, and MANY more!
